description:
An easy to use tool that creates optimal cutting plans and accurate costings that you can have confidence in. Input panel sizes and materials, MaxCut does the restâ€¦

MaxCut is designed for your growing cabinetry business. An easy to use cutlist optimizer that creates optimal cutting plans and accurate costings that you can have confidence in.
- Save a fortune on materials! Cut the sheet to its full potential. Avoid costly saw operator mistakes. No more expensive offcuts lying around your workshop or in the bin.
- Accurate quotations. Generate cabinetry quotations quickly, accurately and efficiently, knowing you have the right price and the correct number of sheets for the job every time.
- All the reports you need. Print to email cut lists, supplier order lists, cabinet labels, professional quotes and more with no extra effort.
Updates
- Grain Match available to all users
  Grain Matching has been moved out of Experimental Features and is now fully available for general use. This enables easier access, a more consistent experience, and wider adoption across all workflows.
Fixes
- Correct highlighting for right-click on hyperlinked panels
  Right-clicking a panel hyperlink now highlights the corresponding panel in the Optimization Layout for quicker navigation and clarity.
- Sheet dimensions on printed Job Layouts for rotated diagrams
  Printed Job Layouts maintain clear spacing and accurate placement of sheet measurements, even when the on-screen diagram is rotated or flipped.
- Re-Optimize prompt when including previously excluded items
  Re-including input items, or making changes to pricing or other optimization-related settings, now prompts for re-optimization. The Re-optimize button appears when you open the Optimized Sheets tab, keeping results up to date.
